item.title: Weekly Review #01 - Emotions, Sense of Security, and Living Earnestly
item.description: 'Here After Us - Mayday' Preface The idea of writing a weekly review had been on my mind since before my birthday. I was initially drawn to the open-source weekly reviews by Xuanwo. On one hand, I aspired to reach a state where I could produce and contribute something every week. On the other hand, I was intrigued by the concept of observing and measuring my life, work, and learning on a weekly scale.
